long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Brobench is an extension to boost your Salesforce productivity. It includes many utilities and featurs that saves you minutes each time you use it. Here are the noteworthy features.

Features:
- Launch the app easily using Brobench icon inside Sfdc UI
- Show Field API Names
- Logins: Securely add connections and login to Salesforce Orgs with click of a button which is protected by a Master Password
- Records: View Record, its fields, edit, clone and delete if required
- Objects: Explore all objects, its fields, formulas and picklist values
- Search: Search for users including critical details like Profile, list of Permsets and do Login as that user in current, incognito and other browser profiles
- Shortcuts: Easily navigate across Salesforce setup with Shortcut URLs with ability to define custom Shortcut URLs
- Text Tool: Convert easily between 15 and 18 chars
- Beautiful Dark Theme support
- And much much more...

Why shoud you install it:
If you interact with Salesforce on a daily basis, it would save you at least 30mins per day and would make browsing objects, querying data and editing data a breeze.

Usage:
- If you want to login to Orgs, add one or more Connections and click on a Connection tile to login.
- If you have already logged in an Org, click on the Brobench icon in the page to launch the window to interact with it

Read complete help at https://help.datasert.com/docs/brobench. If have a suggestion or issue, create a ticket at https://github.com/datasert/brobench-community/issues. 

Have other questions, please reach out to us at support@datasert.com
